elements.name: Information Text
elements.text: Per DOE-0359, to enter an Arc Flash protection boundary (AFPB) employees must meet the requirements of "qualified electrical worker or qualified Instrument Specialist". Other support employees that may have need for entry into an AFPB but must meet the requirements of the qualified above. The Arc Rated cloth program may also be used to provide thermal burn protection from electrical equipment, however these individuals may not enter an AFPB.
